name: Rusty Towers
description:
Rusty Towers

Welcome to Rusty Towers, a defense game with side effects. This game was made as part of the Bevy Jam 3. Click here for the GitHub source.

How to Play

Survive through the phases shown in the top bar to win.

The size of your green base and purple towers indicates their health. Don't let the base die! The more health your base has at the end, the higher your score will be.

There are two phases indicated by the bar at the top:

  • Build phase (green): Click with the mouse to build towers. They'll damage all the surrounding enemies, but be careful they also damage your towers and your base. 
  • Heal phase (red): Click on your towers or bases to heal them. Caution: each time you heal you trigger a new wave of enemies!
Credits

Thanks to the Bevy engine for this delightful jam. Thanks to @jwatson-CO-edu for creating the graphics used in this game. All fonts and icons are borrowed from the Bevy engine's example assets.
